items: Dynamic: Leg swings, ankle circles, walking lunges, banded glute activation
2 rounds: 10 Air Squats, 10 Good Mornings (PCT/bar), 30s Plank Shoulder Taps

blocks.name: Endurance Base - Freight Run
blocks.instructions: 2-mile run for time. Start conservative, finish strong.

exercises.name: Run - 2 Miles (For Time)
exercises.notes: Treadmill 1.0-1.5 incline. Record total time for AFT tracking.

blocks.name: Posterior Chain + Hamstring Strength
blocks.instructions: Focus on clean hinge mechanics. Controlled eccentric.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.notes: Load: 45+25 per side. Maintain soft knees, big chest, tight lats.

exercises.name: Barbell Hip Thrust
exercises.notes: Load: 45+25 per side. Lockout with glutes, pause 1s at top.

exercises.name: DB Step-ups (20 inch)
exercises.notes: Controlled tempo, drive through heel, alternate legs.

blocks.name: Finisher - Aerobic Flush
blocks.instructions: Maintain moderate effort, nasal breathing focus.

exercises.name: Jog/Walk Recovery
exercises.notes: Keep HR below 150 bpm, smooth transitions.
